As an epic arcane archer, the path you pursue depends greatly on the path you took to qualify for the class. This example assumes that you focused on combat abilities, picking up spellcasting only as an afterthought. In this case, Epic Weapon Focus is your first stop, with Distant Shot and Uncanny Accuracy coming soon after. While any archer hopes to never need defense, you don’t have the luxury of ignoring feats such as Epic Toughness and Energy Resistance.
